block.p: LANG-Bernard. Of New York died on June 15, 2000. Beloved husband of Selma Belenky Lang, father of Jane Bloom of Haddonfield, New Jersey, Kenneth Lang of Seattle and Eleanor Lang of New York and step-father of Katrin Belenky Colamarino of New York. Cherished grandfather of nine and great-grandfather of three. Former proprietor of Bernard Lang & Company Inc, customs brokerage firm. Distinguished alumnus of Columbia College. Memorial service at the New York Society for Ethical Culture, 2 West 64 Street, New York at 10AM, on Friday, June 23. In lieu of flowers, contributions may be made in memory of Bernard Lang to United Cerebral Palsy of New York City, Inc, 122 East 23rd St, New York City 10010.
